title: Raspberry jelly with lime syrup and vanilla ice cream
description: James Martin turns his childhood favourite, jelly and ice cream, into a grown up dessert. Equipment and preparation: you will need two 500g/1lb 2oz terrine moulds and an ice cream maker.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped
200ml/7fl oz sugar syrup (leftover from making the jelly)
50ml/2fl oz lime and lime mint cordial
